name: Dog Walking Simulator (wb_gd)
description:
CONTROLS

WASD / Arrow keys for movement
Space to blow whistle and summon dog
Escape to exit to the main menu, or hit escape from the main menu to close the game.

The game auto loads into 'High Quality' mode when start, if you are experiencing significant lag try loading a new quality mode from the Main Menu with the controls below:

    Low Quality - 1 Key
    Medium Quality - 2 Key
    High Quality - 3 Key (Number keys at the top of the keyboard, not the numpad)

PREMISE

If you're a dog owner, you may be familiar with the experience of your dog wrapping itself around a pole or a tree while your trying to go on a nice walk. We decided to take that moment and make a game out of it.

In this game you play as a girl walking her dog. The objective is to return to your house, however, it seems your dog might have a mind of his own!

SOURCES

Jam Team:
Unity work - wb_gd (itch.io), @willbrowngd (twitter)
Blender work - @fjshsoup (twitter)
